content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle marks an entrance located at the left-bottom of the groove. This configuration requires high stiffness normal to the table along the Z-axis, allowing movement inwards with controlled resistance, while permitting motion in X and Y at low stiffness.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 250]
  ]
}
```
